titles.title: Help for All Servicemembers Act
Help for All Servicemembers Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to clarify and expand authorization of support for chaplain-led programs for members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Help for All Servicemembers Act
This bill expands the authorization of support for chaplain-led programs under the Department of Defense, including by authorizing such programs to support resiliency, suicide prevention, or holistic wellness of members of the Armed Forces on activity duty, members of the reserve components in active status, or dependents of such members.
